entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Gaspé
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:19 PM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gaspé Airport 6:00 PM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
Temperature: -1.4°C
Pressure: 101.6 kPa
Humidity: 90 %

Dewpoint: -2.8°C
Wind: E 23 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow and local blowing snow beginning near midnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Local blowing snow in the morning. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 3.
